   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Kinetic Predictor Model
===============================

The Kinetic Predictor Model is a python package used for training neural networks to predict key kinetic properties of chemical reactions such the activation energy.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   requirements
   installation
   tutorial
   usage
